model.name: All_Customers
EU_Customers
model.metadata:
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE ACCOUNT ( ACCOUNTID bigdecimal NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"accountid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CUSTOMERID string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"customerid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ACCOUNTTYPE string(10) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"accounttype"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ACCOUNTSTATUS string(10) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"accountstatus"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DATEOPENED timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"dateopened"', NATIVE_TYPE 'TIMESTAMP', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DATECLOSED timestamp DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"dateclosed"', NATIVE_TYPE 'TIMESTAMP', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_E PRIMARY KEY(ACCOUNTID), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_E4 FOREIGN KEY(CUSTOMERID) REFERENCES CUSTOMER(CUSTOMERID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PUBLIC"."account"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE ACCOUNTHOLDINGS ( TRANSACTIONID string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"transactionid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ACCOUNTID bigdecimal NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"accountid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PRODUCTID string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"productid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), PURCHASEDATE timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"purchasedate"', NATIVE_TYPE 'TIMESTAMP', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PRODUCTSHARES bigdecimal DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"productshares"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_4 PRIMARY KEY(TRANSACTIONID), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_4E FOREIGN KEY(ACCOUNTID) REFERENCES ACCOUNT(ACCOUNTID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PUBLIC"."accountholdings"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE CUSTOMER ( CUSTOMERID string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"customerid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), FIRSTNAME string(25) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"firstname"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), LASTNAME string(25) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"lastname"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), MIDDLENAME string(15) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"middlename"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), STREETADDRESS string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"streetaddress"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), STREETADDRESS2 string(50) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"streetaddress2"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CITY string(25) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"city"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), STATEPROVINCE string(25) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"stateprovince"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), POSTALCODE string(15) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"postalcode"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), COUNTRY string(10) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"country"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), PHONENUMBER string(30) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"phonenumber"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_5 PRIMARY KEY(CUSTOMERID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"customer"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')

model.name: EU_Customers_VBL
EU_Customers_EDL
US_Customers
model.metadata:
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE ACCOUNT ( ACCOUNTID bigdecimal NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"accountid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SSN string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ssn"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ACCOUNTTYPE string(10) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"accounttype"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ACCOUNTSTATUS string(10) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"accountstatus"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DATEOPENED timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"dateopened"', NATIVE_TYPE 'TIMESTAMP', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DATECLOSED timestamp DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"dateclosed"', NATIVE_TYPE 'TIMESTAMP', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_E PRIMARY KEY(ACCOUNTID), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_E4 FOREIGN KEY(SSN) REFERENCES CUSTOMER(SSN) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PUBLIC"."account"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE ACCOUNTHOLDINGS ( TRANSACTIONID string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"transactionid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ACCOUNTID bigdecimal NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"accountid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PRODUCTID string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"productid"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), PURCHASEDATE timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"purchasedate"', NATIVE_TYPE 'TIMESTAMP', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PRODUCTSHARES bigdecimal NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"productshares"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_4 PRIMARY KEY(TRANSACTIONID), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_4E FOREIGN KEY(ACCOUNTID) REFERENCES ACCOUNT(ACCOUNTID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PUBLIC"."accountholdings"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE CUSTOMER ( SSN string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ssn"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), FIRSTNAME string(25) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"firstname"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), LASTNAME string(25) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"lastname"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), MIDDLEINITIAL string(15) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"middleinitial"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), STREETADDRESS1 string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"streetaddress1"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), APTNUMBER string(50) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"aptnumber"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CITY string(25) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"city"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), STATE string(25) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"state"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ZIPCODE string(15) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"zipcode"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), PHONE string(30) DEFAULT 'NULL' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"phone"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT CONSTRAINT_5 PRIMARY KEY(SSN) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PUBLIC"."customer"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
